website_summaries.verdict: High-end, heavy duty water resistant nasal and ear trimmer. Convenient and highly portable, complete with LED torch to see the hard-to-reach areas.
pros: Water-resistant chassis makes this shower-proof and easy to clean down after use
Lightweight and powerful rotary cutting system cuts hairs from the top and side, making sure to get hard to reach stray hairs
cons: Some users say the trigger button came loose after a while

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!  A trimmer that works!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many of the trimmers and most of them are absolute junk. I have tried Remington, Panasonic and others, all with the same miserable results. Most do not have enough power to spin the blades inside the head never mind actually trimming a nose or ear hair. This guy is the exception to the rule. I love this trimmer as it is the only one that works as expected. This spins at least twice as fast as my Remington and Panasonic trimmers did. No issues cutting any hair anywhere. The Panasonic and Remington are now resting in the worthless trimmer junk pile (trash).
customer_reviews.author: Texas Lee

customer_reviews.title: broke after using it a few times
customer_reviews.text: I used this just a few times before it broke (as many others have reported). Basically, the button that you need to turn this thing on fell off after a few uses. I'm actually able to turn it on by jamming something very thin into the right spot (I use part of a metal pen to do this). I don't understand why this has such high reviews; frankly its a waste of money because it's just not durable.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy dean

customer_reviews.title: Painless- much more comfortable than usual women's style trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I know the woman got a lot of grief for asking if this was for ladies also. But to tell the truth, that was my question too. It does not look at all like the usual flat sided ones that they sell for women. It is by far, the nicest, most pain-free one I have ever used. I almost didn't buy it because it looks huge compared to the ones they typically sell for women. I think if anyone tries it, they will really like it. The difference is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: NC Sue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Perform As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: If a product fails to perform as advertised what rating would you give it? I would give this product a zero if I could. It worked once or twice, I changed batteries a couple of times because it began to not cut the hairs. I made certain it was emptied following instructions provided by seller. It only decreased in productivity and effectiveness. However it did manage to hold off past the return date, so I guess the seller was successful in that endeavor.
customer_reviews.author: david floyd

customer_reviews.title: Bad luck or poor quality nose trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Head was broken inside sealed undamaged box, Packet right up sent back and refunded. I'll stick with ManGroomer they work great but only last about a year, cheap $9.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed! I do not understand how there is good reviews for this product..
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, i am shocked by the great reviews.I was so eager to try this,only to be disappointed.It is so clear it is not fully doing the job and lacks power.A waste of my money..I might as well go back to trimming on my own with scissors.Don't do it! i cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: How to weasel out of the warranty
customer_reviews.text: So by opening my purchase I void the warranty. That seems to diminish the usefulness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Update: rec'd. A good one
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE! Looked promising, but when I inserted the battery and turned it on, it sounded fine, but then it would not turn off. Defective switch I suppose. Another reviewer had the same problem. Update: Mr. Parisi, President of ToiletTree personally contacted me and offered to send me a working trimmer, which he did. I rec'd. It today and it works great. That's what I call great customer service. Thank you Mr. Parisi.
customer_reviews.author: eyelevel

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy it's cheap
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This died after only 6 uses. Not worth the time trying to return it's that appears it's going to be a battle getting them to take it back. The top part won't go back on right, you can't clean the blade only rinse it and it only will work in your nose and not very well at that. It pulled a clump now I have a sore spot.
customer_reviews.author: BigDogChloe

customer_reviews.title: This is the trimmer I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: After years of buying junky "name brand" trimmers I finally found a good one. The others were always under-powered or failed altogether but this one from Toilettree is a keeper. It's substantial in weight but more importantly packs a lot of power from 1 AA battery. Stop buying those garbage name brand trimmers and get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Inspired Reader

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item for a little over a year, using it no more than 10 times, 3 minutes at a time. And it just stopped working. This means that it lasted less than an hour of use. I paid a little over $17 here in Amazon. In my book, this is trash and i do not recommend it. Now, moving on and purchasing some known brand.
customer_reviews.author: SAH

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty? Sold!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this. It is powerful and sharp and has a lighted led flashlight on it. Can’t tell you how many of these I have purchased over the years and then one day just don’t don’t turn on and this, the cycle repeats. I’ve only used this a couple times so far but the lifetime warranty is what made me purchase. We shall see if that happens in time with this one and if so and how the company handles it but for now, I’m a happy customer. I am slightly afraid it is going to cut the inside or my nose as it seems so powerful but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ramone

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 7 mo of light use
customer_reviews.text: This did the job fine, but the blade started popping off after 7 months of occasional use. Threw it out after the third time. Has lots of great reviews so maybe I just got a lemon. I see that the company responds to these negative reviews, but I already tossed mine out. (kinda freaky when the blade pops off in your nose!) I am going to try the Suprent brand next.
customer_reviews.author: jswest

customer_reviews.title: Broke After Second Use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like the ToiletTree Professional nose trimmer. It felt good in my hand, the cutting blade seemed sharp enough. But it died after the second use. The on/off switch was sticky. Upon the second use it had used quite a bit of the battery. I turned off the unit and tried to turn on again, but the switch was no longer making proper contact. I could press down on the switch and it worked for a short time, but alas it finally gave out! I would not recommend buying the ToiletTree Professional trimmer. Look for something much more sturdy and something that does not drain a battery so fast.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Short life.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in July 2017. Worked well but died 1st part of oct, 2017. Supposed to have lifetime warranty but now can't find any information about replacing nose hair clipper. Help!
customer_reviews.author: B. L. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in hopes of giving the much needed nostrils a haircut. But these didn’t perform as I expected! I’ve owned multiple brands of this exact design and these seem to lack the power that others offered. They seem to pull the hairs out at times instead of cutting. I’ve changed batteries multiple times hoping that would do the trick but ended up with the same results. They now just sit under the sink while I’m back to using scissors. :(
customer_reviews.author: Steven M

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work worth squat ......
customer_reviews.text: I'm finally here after giving this thing almost a year of a chance to prove he's worth the money ....... if you're trying to do nose hairs, this 'may' work if you spend 5 minutes going back and forth, back and forth, back and forth ....... ear canal hair? ....... forget it ...... I just reorded my trust Panasonic ........ should never have gotten rid of him in the first place ........ but I saw all these good reviews and ....... I will give this trimmer credit for 'one' thing ....... it wont 'pull' any hairs ....... nose or otherwise .......
customer_reviews.author: C. Green

customer_reviews.title: Painless
customer_reviews.text: It really does its job without pulling. I was skeptical but decided to try this item. I have never used one before and all I could imagine was the extreme pain if this thing didn't work as described and pulled my nose hairs. But I've now used it several times with no problems at all. It's so quick and easy that I'm sorry I didn't get one long ago. Update 8/29/17 It's now 8+ months later and this thing still works great. It has never pulled a hair. I'm still in awe that this inexpensive little gadget can work so well. Good on ears and eye brows too.
customer_reviews.author: H Davis

customer_reviews.title: I hated it. This device has simplified the process
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I waited over a month to do this review. It works as advertised. I am over 60 and the healthiest part of my body is my nose hairs. It is ridiculous, but every week or so, they have grown long and voluminous. It used to be a battle with the clippers, between cutting all the hairs or my nose. I hated it. This device has simplified the process. When I notice the growth coming back, I pull this thing out and run it into my nose. I will do several minutes in each nostril. It is painless and does the job until the next time. Just very easy to do. I really appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: NCBeach

customer_reviews.title: Works ok but nothing special
customer_reviews.text: When I unpacked this trimmer I was expecting A lot more power and speed of the blade because of how heavy and big it is. But it's no different than the small $10 trimmers you can buy at Target or Walmart. The little LED light is pretty useless because it's not bright enough and it's too diffused to show much. I'm giving it three stars because it technically does the job but don't get your hopes up too high.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefin17

customer_reviews.title: ToiletTree Nose Trimmer - the best
customer_reviews.text: This works better than other ones I've tried, with less pulling of hairs. I think the reason is the way the head is designed. I've included a picture of the cutting heads of another brand, on the left, and the ToiletTree on the right. The switch is a tiny bit hard to operate till you get the hang of it - push the white thing in before you slide the switch. They should have gotten an English-speaker to work on the name a little, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: billfish

customer_reviews.title: Maybe it's the operator
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what the issue is with this thing, maybe it's the operator but every time I go to use it it sounds like the battery is dying. I'll admit the first time I went to use it, I had some off the wall brand battery that I was pretty sure was new. It sounded like the battery was dying and I figure it was the battery. The next time I use a Energizer battery brand new out of the pack and the same sound but it worked alright but the battery only lasted 3-4 times. Then I used Duracell and the same deal. This thing sounds like it is dying all the time and eats batteries like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Bensen

customer_reviews.title: Only lifetime warranties are real!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding customer service. They really do back their lifetime warranty. My trimmer started having an issue about two years in, where the on/off switch started getting sticky and the motor was beginning to die. Note, the trimmer did work great up to that point. I emailed the company asking about the warranty and they responded almost immediately and had a replacement trimmer in the mail that very day. You can’t ask for better service.
customer_reviews.author: Morbidcorpse

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Cut Well or Find Hair
customer_reviews.text: The LED light didn't function from the day of purchase. It doesn't seem to have a powerful motor, doesn't rotate very fast, and sounds like it's straining as if the battery is weak, even with fresh new batteries. It either isn't "finding" the hair or isn't cutting it well. Maybe I have a dud. I don't have a basis of comparison on the unit or versus another brand. It does not perform to purpose of use. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: john b

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After a Few Uses
customer_reviews.text: I only got to use this a handful of times because it broke so quickly. The power button turns it on, but it refuses to go off unless I take the battery out. In addition to this, the bottom does not line up and click into place and takes several tries to get it to lock in, so the battery won't fall out. Overall, this is just a very cheaply made product and I would definitely encourage potential buyers to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Jusk OK
customer_reviews.text: Tried it and it works OK.....You have to swipe over and over a hair for it to be removed. It gets tedious after awhile. The end results are mediocre. This is not a bad product, it will work but it's just not a star product.....I have the feeling there are similar other nose trimmers out there which do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Bros

customer_reviews.title: it is ok
customer_reviews.text: I used this product mostly to tackle my nose hairs. The trimmer is powerful, leaving no hairs behind. It is unusually heavy and not very ergonomic to use. Since I started using it, I started to develop ingrown hairs inside my nose. I do not recommend this trimmers for long term use. Prior to buying this trimmer, i used the Panasonic ER-GN30-K Nose Ear Hair Trimmer for many years, until it finally stopped working. I never had ingrown hairs inside my nose. I am going back to that one again.
customer_reviews.author: ROM

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband since he was using nail clippers to trim his nose hairs (yes you read that right). He used it for a while and said it worked fine, but not as close a cut and the nail clipper. We even dropped it and it came apart and we were able to put it back together and still work. I think he went back to the nail clippers, but he is just weird. For the most part this trimmer works for a normal person.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Running with the Devil
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done, blades never catch and pull hairs as I've experienced with other trimmers, batteries seem to last a while in it. My only complaint is the ghost of David Lee Roth didn't deliver it personally. I'd been looking forward to that.
customer_reviews.author: T. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Worthless piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: The positive reviews must be paid for because this product is a worthless piece of junk. It neither trims nor cuts facial and nose hair. I was a sucker for the positive reviews. Let this be a warning to prospective buyers. This product is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Company honors warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a little over 2 years ago. It died recently. Was going to just outright buy another one at 15 bucks figured why not. Then decided to see if the company would honor their lifetime warranty. I was thrilled to learn they mean it when they say lifetime. They asked for a copy of the order information and shipped me out a new one. Just got it today. If you do need warranty support for their product send and email from their website and/or call. At least as of Dec 2017, they are standing behind their products. Thanks ToiletTree!
customer_reviews.author: ss

customer_reviews.title: Solid device, works well! Customer support is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in 2016 and loved the build quality and feel. Not cheap plastic like other nose hair trimmers that I have tried. Takes a single AA and is easy to clean. When mine stopped working early this year, I contacted the company and was reminded of the lifetime warranty. They asked for my Amazon order number and sent a replacement immediately. Excellent customer service! I definitely recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MacInTX

customer_reviews.title: Failed after only a dozen uses..... BUT
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One still works after about two dozen uses in 18 months. The other failed after only a dozen uses in 18 months. The trimmer that is still working has a switch that is becoming stiffer and stiffer to turn on and off. Poor quality control seems to be a hallmark of items like this made in China and the $15 per unit price seems high for what you purchase. Caveat emptor. UPDATE 10/13: Always a pleasure for me to recognize a person who provides SUPERIOR customer service. This company's representative Ms "Lu" was very pleasant and responsive to my complaint and within a few days I had received a replacement under the lifetime guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: After using the once ... a little silver piece fell out and I have no clue as to where it goes and who to contact... I certainly thought this would more than one use UPDATE: Sent an email to Toilettree about what happened .. they reached out to me the very next day and are sending a new top to it. That was surprising and very unanticipated. Nice job .. new rating .. 4stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. This replaced a Panasonic which had worked well for years till it died. This trimmer worked poorly out of the box and worse after the first cleaning. It can cut a hair long enough to get into the assembly but leaves stubbly remnants. Totally useless.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is: the lifetime warranty is for real, and customer service is outstanding and responsive. I bought this trimmer a couple of years ago. The plastic tabs that hold the blade onto the trimmer broke. Customer service answered my message about the problem in less than an hour, and I received a complete new trimmer at my doorstep in less than a week. On top of that, it's just a great trimmer. Entirely worth a few bucks more than the other ones.
customer_reviews.author: StandUpBassist

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Love the light
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers claim the light is useless and I couldn't disagree more. My last one of these I decided to replace another brand I had since the 90's without a light and when I got this I thought no big deal, but having that light is a real bonus to help you see what you want to cut. This seems well built and is heavy, but not too heavy. It just feels solid and really does a great job. My old one must have been pulling for years because it hurt a little when I used it, but this new one is sharp and cuts without pulling. A very pleasant, pain free experience and you will appreciate the light!
customer_reviews.author: Indy Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Company stands behind their product - The warranty is real, trimmer works great
customer_reviews.text: There are over 10,000 reviews here already so I am just going to add a little more should anyone come across this in the sea of reviews. This trimmer works very well. It's easy to hold, simple to operate. The light is a nice touch. The best part - the lifetime warranty is real. Eleven months in, I had an issue with the cutter. I contacted the company and they sent me a replacement. I'm back in business. They were friendly and helpful. You never actually know how these warranties are going to pan out but in the case of this trimmer, you get exactly what was promised. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas ParkerTop Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: It was effective until it got broken
customer_reviews.text: After about a year it got broken. Very disappointed because I liked it. I see the words about life time warranty just are the words.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Amazing trimmer! The best I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Used this ToiletTree trimmer for a few weeks and is surpassed expectations and has made the grooming process SO MUCH EASIER!! Just outstanding. Very well made. Great power and uses a AA battery too , which is a plus for giving it more power and less battery changing. Worked well after rinsing it and is running perfectly. The LED light is kinda useful and something I didn't know I needed on my trimmer until I used it on this one. Can't believe I didn't buy this product sooner and was very glad to throw away the other 2 subpar trimmers I had been using all these previous years.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Tried others, this one is tops.
customer_reviews.text: Just reordered after the last one was getting dull and the tiny LED light was no longer working. I like the light for when I'm trimming husband's ears, it really does help a lot. I could have ordered replacement blades, but really -- the price for the unit is quite reasonable so it's not worth the fuss of changing blades. The last one is still working after 2 1/2 years of frequent use, just no longer sharp enough, takes too many passes to get those stubborn little hairs. We've tried a couple of others in the past, and this one was the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: avid rita

customer_reviews.title: A downgrade to the Panasonic unit that broke after 12 years
customer_reviews.text: In short, this thing works, but it doesn’t work as well as the effusive reviews imply. It takes a long time and many passes to trim relatively few hairs, and it heats up a lot in use. Only mediocre, I wish I’d bought a better known brand.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gitzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Broken - Defective
customer_reviews.text: The item is broken,,,,, the cup that hold everything together on the tip is broken and will not stay on. Can't use it. Please replace it..... Lifetime guarantee eh?
customer_reviews.author: Bob E

customer_reviews.title: Cuts those pesky nose hairs rather than ripping them out by the root!!! No pain!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Panasonic nose hair trimmer has finally ripped the last hair outta my nostrils! I looked at several trimmers before deciding to buy this one. It feels pretty solid in my hand and cuts the hairs instead of ripping them out by the root and leaving you on the bathroom floor curled up in the fetal position. Its got an LED light to light up your nose hole but I really don't get much benefit from it. I've been using it for awhile and am very pleased so far. If in 6 months it starts yanking them out instead of cutting them I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trimmer,
customer_reviews.text: I've never been impressed with my Wahl trimmers from Wal-Mart. After researching I almost considered buying a Remington. It was rated the best in several reviews. Then I found this from Toilet Tree. Amazon reviews were great. It was a little more expensive but it was worth it. This thing is beefy. Feels solid in the hand. It cuts closer and more effectively than any trimmer I've owned. usually I can trim my nose go back and trim again it's like I never did it the first time. This trimmer does well on the first swipe. This trimmer is worth the order. Great service, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Men, you need this device!
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever been speaking face to face with someone and lose your concentration on what you were supposed to be talking about because your attention was diverted to the long hairs protruding from the person's nostrils? Talk about a gross site. Well, I have. That's when I decided to purchase my first nose hair trimmer. When that nose hair trimmer wore out, I threw it away a purchased this stainless steel water resistant nose hair trimmer by ToiletTree. Its built-in LED light allows me to visually check my nostrils to insure I have the results I expect.
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: After Two Years I Find It An Okay Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for about two years now and I like it but I don’t love it. It does the job but it’s kinda hard to clean. Also, minor detail but one of the metal prongs broke. One thing that I can’t complain about is that I haven’t changed the batteries once since purchase. It works but in the future when this dies I will be looking for another type/brand. If you can get it super cheap then it will at least last you two years. Edit: the broken prong can cut and cause bleeding. Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this thing!
customer_reviews.text: ToiletTree Professional Water Resistant Heavy Duty Steel Nose Trimmer with LED Light, Silver: After telling my husband that his little scissor that he uses for trimming his nose hair weren't really cutting it, I bought this for him. I spent about an hour looking at reviews for the different nose hair trimmers, and decided on this one. When it came and he opened it, he said it was a waste of money and he would never use it. When I gave him a battery, he inserted it and went into the bathroom to give it a try. Guess what? He LOVES it! Very simple to use, no pinching and no more unsightly nose hair!
customer_reviews.author: sleepyhead

customer_reviews.title: On / Off slider is really annoying design
customer_reviews.text: The little mini white slide lock button is ridiculously hard to push if you have larger hands. I'm not sure if mine is defective or not but I have to push the button in with the tip of my thumb nail and apply tons of pressure to either lock or unlock it. It's annoying enough where I'm thinking about just going back to the old Panasonic it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: CAD

customer_reviews.title: Some high quality steel, plenty of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: "About the product" says; "Our trimmer body is made of high quality steel. Not cheap plastic." Yes that's true, but there is still a good amount of cheap plastic in other areas. For example, where the cutting blades lock to the body is all plastic. When I dropped it the locking mechanism broke and now the whole thing is useless. My fault entirely, yes, but don't be fooled into believing the "high quality steel" will protect this thing in a fall.
customer_reviews.author: 00derek

customer_reviews.title: Proceed with some caution, good support after sale
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a nice product. It’s not like I use this all day every day. Just once in a while. After 6 months, dead as a stone. Changed battery, nope... first it just started to be a little sluggish on start, now no action at all. So much for a premium product. When it worked, it was good. Update- registered my complaint through their website. The responded quickly and sent out a replacement no questions asked. I hope this one lasts. When it works, it’s a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T Holtrop

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer...
customer_reviews.text: A very well made, high-quality nose trimmer! We have purchased several of these. We keep one at home in the upstairs and downstairs bathrooms, one is also kept in the car, and the others are always in our travel toiletry bags. This trimmer also works well to trim ear hair and sideburns. The LED light is very handy and helps you to see any hairs you have missed. I also purchased the storage cases for each unit here on Amazon. Here's the link:  We've also purchased other products from Toilet Tree and highly recommend this company! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PhyllieDee

customer_reviews.title: Don't let nose/ear hairs ruin your appearance
customer_reviews.text: Cuts great . Nice price and rather quiet to use in nose. Came quickly. Light can be used to find strays. A name brand I had before this started to pull hair in nose and had problems with switch and battery connection. So far worked fine and switch is a nice smooth turn on. Like it a lot, hope is gives me years of satisfaction, and smooth cuts. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: likesparkle

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I just got lemon...
customer_reviews.text: I got this based on the glowing reviews for it. However, I apparently get to join the ranks of the people who did not have good luck with it. I used it a few times, and then it just stopped working altogether. Unfortunately, by that time I was out of the return period. I'm not impressed and will be looking for something else. Edit: The company got in contact with me and promptly sent me a replacement free of charge. Now multiple months and many uses later, the new trimmers have been fantastic. I would buy them again purely for the customer service. But it is nice to have a neatly trimmed nose as well.
customer_reviews.author: SleepingKnight

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime replacement as advertised👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: This was actually a good product. I didn't use it heavily, but I used it here and there since late 2016. Well about a month ago it stopped working. I thought maybe the battery was dead but I put a brand new battery in and it won't turn on at all. It said it had lifetime replacement. I will see what happens when I contact the seller. I'll update this tomorrow. *Update* They got back to me and have me a replacement right away. Great product
customer_reviews.author: THATZLIFE

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well until the plastic top with the cutting blades/shaft broke
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good unit and worked for maybe a year. Did a great job on the nose hair. It takes a AA battery which I wanted and the NiMH rechargeable batteries worked which was great. The problem was when the plastic cone top which holds the cutting blade/shaft broke off. Maybe my fault given that I had lost the protective cap but in looking at it, it didn't seem like a very strong design and I bet others might have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: G. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Thought I was buying a quality trimmer when I bought this but it's not any better than a $5
customer_reviews.text: Used less than 2 months (Lifetime guarantee but no help on how to do this?) and it stops. This is just one of several trimmers that I use (all bought from Amazon BTW) so it is only used 2 or 3 times a week. Locked up, won't run or even buzz. Thought I was buying a quality trimmer when I bought this but it's not any better than a $5.00 trimmer it seems. So now I am looking "again" for good trimmer to buy that will hold up to my mighty nose hairs, lol I'd think twice about this one folks.
customer_reviews.author: J. Timberlake

customer_reviews.title: Cuts like a Hattori Hanzo Sword
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this is one well built trimmer. After using a Panasonic for the last 7 years, I needed to replace it after it died. I went with toilet tree because of the reviews and it's head and shoulders above my Panasonic in terms of power and clean cuts. The LED is kind of a waste but the trimmer itself is sturdy and the blades cut like a ninja knife in the forest. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Seller Honors Lifetime Guarantee!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit about 3 years ago, and recently the cutting blade broke rendering it useless. I saw that the seller had a lifetime guarantee but I was skeptical that it would be honored. Much to my surprise, I sent the seller a photo and my receipt and he immediately responded! Quickly sent a replacement blade at no charge and now it works great again. It is very nice to see a seller that stands behind the "lifetime guarantee." Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jake C6R

customer_reviews.title: Great little trimmer
customer_reviews.text: I like it for the most part. I don’t like the light on it. Don’t need a light and it’s very bright in my eyes. However I turn the light away and it’s fine. It would be nice if you could turn off the light. Works great but it takes a tweezers to remove the blades for cleaning. They should include a pair of plastic tweezers in the box for cleaning. All in all it’s a good little trimmer and I do recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gatekeeper

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre performer, and gave out after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what it is about ear and nose hair trimmers. I have yet to find one that is ergonomically designed, easy to use, reliable, and long-lasting. Am I asking for so much? This one was adequate, barely, working most of the time but not all of the time, difficult to clean, and as of today officially kaput. So I'll be trying another one, hoping for a miracle -- a trustworthy product that does what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Droon by the loove

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer does a good job. It's smooth, comfortable and there is absolutely no pulling. It's powerful enough that it cuts the hair on the first pass. I've had it for more than 2 years and it has never given any skin irritation. In addition to the product being outstanding, the customer service provided by Toilettree Products is excellent. They are easy to do business with. Replacements under the lifetime warranty are a snap. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: workingforaliving

customer_reviews.title: Spinning Blade assembly is made of plastic
customer_reviews.text: The middle piece that holds the blades is made of plastic. This part will eventually break and the blades will fall out. This is the problem with all of these spinning blade nose trimmers. The entire blade assembly needs to be made with metal to hold the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great Until it Broke
customer_reviews.text: I used the trimmer around 5 times before the top broke off when I was trying to clean it. I'm not sure if this is fixable and I'm not able to figure it out - or possibly the entire trimming system has been broken. Worked great while it worked, painless - and did a good job trimming hairs everywhere. I'm not sure how I go-about using the lifetime replacement guarantee - hopefully this review will help me figure this part out?
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: too thick, and has flimsy Spring
customer_reviews.text: too thick, and has flimsy Spring when you open to clean. and it's too hard (too deep) to pull out the White plastic piece holding the blade . whereas, panasonic and the FlePow, i can grab the white long piece to remove blade. It doesn't cut close as FlePow which is the num 1 seller or highest rated.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Kim

customer_reviews.title: A great trimmer and even better customer service....A++++
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trimmer back in 2015. It has served me well over the years. Works great, easy to use, does the job it's supposed to do. Unfortunately, last week it just stopped working...dead. It says there is a lifetime replacement warranty. So I wrote to the seller (Toilet Tree) and explained the situation. My email was answered within 1 day. It said no worries. Send them my address and order number. I got a BRAND NEW replacement today (5 days after my email to them - WOW). HOW"S THAT FOR GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE! I don't think you can find a company or seller that can beat that. So, forget your shopping. Just buy this one...it's a win-win all around?
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Best Available
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many nose shavers and I thought Panasonic was the best until I tried these. This is by far the best nose hair trimmer I've come across. I have an attractive nose, however, it's a nose that one can partially see inside the edge of the nose. When I was young I didn't have to worry about nose hair but I'm older now and it's part of my grooming regime. I keep one in the car too (I know, gross). It trims the smallest hairs in difficult places. Love them! P.S. I am not affiliated with the company in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Azure

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 30 months
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this so I am giving it a middle of the road review. On one hand it worked well for the time I had it and perhaps for less than $20 getting 2 1/2 years out of it is good. On the other hand this was supposed to be a premium device and for it to break the way it did without a ton of use or misuse then it kind of seems like its not that good of a product. So three stars, it was good while it lasted. I will replace it with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crisci

customer_reviews.title: Seemed as if it would be good at first but it is difficult to reassemble after ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed as if it would be good at first but it is difficult to reassemble after cleaning (which should be done frequently) and internal components ultimately failed after only a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, actually
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this primarily to deal with pesky nose hairs (hey, I'm old - so sue me!). I find the trimmer easy to use and the light actually helps more as my eyes are getting worse (hey, I said I'm getting old!) I find the trimmer doesn't work so well on the short hairs on my ears, and I often have to resort to tweezers, but that's okay. I bought for nose hairs, darn it! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: KARL LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Best nose hair trimmer I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now, it works extremely well, has held up well and is super easy to clean/waterproof. I would buy it again if it broke but it says lifetime warranty so I'm not too worried about that. Make sure you use good batteries for it to work at its full potential. I wish it was a little stronger, feels like it doesn't cut the inside side hairs as well as it does just straight back.
customer_reviews.author: Noah B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful, it caught by the hairs and stops working, The motor is not nearly as strong as it should be. Please don't waste your money like I did and invest in a better quality product
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away within 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like mildew shortly after I cleaned it the first time. Not easy to clean and eventually I lost a critical part. I replaced it with a Wahl and haven’t had any trouble. I didn’t care for the light either, kept shining in my eye as I trimmed my nose hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This worked fine while it lasted, but eventually the blade broke, without which it is now useless. It advertises a lifetime replacement guarantee, but there is no way to contact the seller regarding this. Don't fall for this, spend your money on something more robust.
customer_reviews.author: Vik

customer_reviews.title: Just another Plastic Clunker
customer_reviews.text: The title says "Heavy Duty". That's complete nonsense. Bought this after having the impression that it was well-built and sturdy because of the title. Nope. Dropped it... not on the floor... onto the sink. Probably a drop of no more than 12". It's now broken in two different places. I'd pay a king's ransom for a nose hair trimmer that actually has metal parts and will last. This is just more of the same cheap material you find on everything else out there.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyfunk

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the timeliness of the delivery, but found the light did not work. No problem when I contacted the company and they promised a replacement which will arrive shortly. I used the one with no light and found otherwise that it worked great and cleaned up easily. I am very pleased with the company and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great product and they stand behind warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great product with customer service to match. Small plastic part broke. I contacted seller for replacement part and they are shipping an entire new unit. I should add they responded and resolved within an hour on a Sunday morning!. I bought this to replace Panasonic that died after less than 8 months. This is a superior product and with lifetime guarantee a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: amazonuser09

customer_reviews.title: Great clipper, even better company!
customer_reviews.text: This little trimmer does a great job, I've owned it for almost 3 years and had never had a problem! One day the clipper stopped working, remembering the Toilettree company offered a lifetime warranty on this product I decided to reach out to them, and guess what they were apologetic and eager to help with a full replacement! Thank you to the President of the company, Steve Parisi for standing behind such a great product! I look forward to purchasing other items from them!
customer_reviews.author: Ezee1

customer_reviews.title: Just OK - painful but does the job - UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: Body seems solid, but trimmer almost identical in performance to cheap Wal-Mart ones I've used in the past. The LED light is a gimmick, you're not going to see much in your nose or ear while this thing is jammed in there. Feel pulling and plucking pain that even cheaper ones didn't have. Uneven "motor" sound, will randomly get louder and quieter as if under stress. All in all, wish I'd just stuck with something cheaper that does just as well, if not better. UPDATE - Seller reached out and provided free replacement. The new device works better. Added a star.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: WOW really works well
customer_reviews.text: I had this nose trimmer for 3 years and it worked great. After 3 years it just stopped working. So I notified ToiletTree Customer Service and effortlessly given a replacement without any questions asked. Who does that after 3 years! I highly recommend this item as it does a great job, has a light on it too, runs on batterys and a GREAT GUARANTEE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathi b

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but do all the parts last with it?
customer_reviews.text: This trimmer has worked much better for me than the Panasonic ER Wet/Dry. It is better to handle, the light is a nice addition when pointing inside your nose, and the water cleaning ability is great. It feels like its built like a tank, a big plus vs the Panasonic, which stopped working maybe 2 months in. Only problem wiht the ToiletTree Trimmer is that the top component covering the blades has partially broken and I cant find a replacement. I hate to have to buy another trimmer when the machine works just fine and it looks like it will for a long time. Dissapointed I have to shelf this nice machine. So 3 instead of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a great little device, and it worked well, but when I cleaned the tip out last time, now I can't get it to work at all. It says there's a lifetime replacement guarantee, but I can't figure out how to get in touch with someone from the company to either give me the parts in the tip that need to be replaced, or replace the entire thing because it's not working at all right now.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: A Solid product with a feel of lasting durability.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been cursed with nose hair for years and none of the products I tried seemed to help as they would often break. I read about this trimmer’s durability and it certainly is sturdy and feels as if it will last a long time. The light is a nice touch and the blades cut with precision without any tugging. If for any reason the trimmer fails , I won’t hesitate to purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Lee J Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Avoid This Nose Trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Amazon sold the same trimmer with the words "MODERN MAN" on the body just below the on/off slide. Now it says "TOILET TREE". I looked at the pictures and compared it to my "non-working" clipper and it is the exact same clipper, even the color is the same. My on/off slide switch froze up on me. I couldn't move the slide switch in either direction. This is the first review I have ever written on a product. Be forewarned. To be fair, when I received it , the slide switch worked. but it got harder and harder to slide back and forth and eventually froze up.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Giebler

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: I was initially skeptical about how well this type of trimming device actually worked. I read mixed reviews on numerous other similar products. But the pain of using tweezers to rip out the hair by the roots made me think anything has to be better. Well this little tool works great and cuts very well with no pain or pulling..at least for me. Use a good quality AA battery and it'll spin up and cut like crazy. I actually find the little LED lamp helpful. I recommend giving this product a try
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Jelomono

customer_reviews.title: The Right Trimmer for the Job
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy, well constructed trimmer with a heavy-duty motor, that although a bit loud, does the job quickly without effort. The trimmer is not only sleek looking but has a six-sided, easy-grip cross section that fits the hand comfortably. The clear dome protective cap snaps on and off easily, and the cutting head unscrews just as easily for cleaning with the included bristle brush. The single AA battery (not included) needed installs in a snap. All and all, it's a ear and nose trimmer that should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Keller

customer_reviews.title: Get this is you grow pesky hair in places you don't want.
customer_reviews.text: Yep... i stick this up my nose and ears once in a while and magically i end up with no hair in those areas. It works well. Classic design ensures that it's not a one hitter quitter! Somewhat waterproof (but I'm not gonna test that). Excellent for it's price. Second best feature, the little led light that comes on to assist!
customer_reviews.author: D. GriffinTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Why Didn't I Get this Sooner
customer_reviews.text: Previous to owning this product, I used to use tweezers on any unpleasantly long nose hairs to clean myself up a bit, which at times caused some irritating pains. I'm glad I found this, It allows me to do virtually the same thing, but even better being faster, a lot less painful, and more precise when trimming my nose hairs. The LED light brings a great touch to this as well, so precision is performed while in the process of trimming. Water resistance is a huge plus as well, this is a great trimmer.
customer_reviews.author: J Castro

customer_reviews.title: It cuts the hair
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used four different nose trimmers. Phillips being the one brand I hated the most. BUT after some bad experiences I was concerned if buying another. So I went ahead a few months later and bought this one. Surprisingly works really well for the price! I would recommend. Cleaning the thing is the only little difficult part. But maybe idk what I’m doing...
customer_reviews.author: Kouki Chrisp

customer_reviews.title: Totally un dependable
customer_reviews.text: Had this trimmer for a year. Have used it (at most) a dozen times. When it worked it was fine. But every time I use it, I have to change the battery. Today even with the battery change, I couldn’t get the trimmer to start. Yes, the “GOOD NEWS!” Lifetime warranty paper that comes with the trimmer is a nice touch, but is even better is to have a dependable grooming tool at the exact time you want to use it. Dependable is not equivalent to being accountable. As well intended as the manufacturer is, it doesn’t help me in “the moment”. Today this trimmer went into the trash.
customer_reviews.author: MSpec

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I really love this trimmer. It does the job and does it extremely well. I was hesitant to buy these because I've had trimmers of this same design before (the round tube thing with the blades inside it) and they did not perform well at all. But based on the reviews on amazon and some external sites decided to give these a shot. Well, I was NOT disappointed. The only thing I can think of to say that isn't to my liking is the light. It doesn't get in the way for me but I don't really see it helping me either. That's just my opinion and I'm sure other people use it and like that it is included.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Callison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this trimmer for my husband for Christmas last year. He absolutely loves it. He’s a clean freak and uses it all the time! The other day he was cleaning it and dropped one of the pieces down the sink. He tore apart the pipes but couldnt find the part. He was seriously upset! I quickly ordered him a new unit. When it arrived 2-days later he was so relieved. I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Darcie Newbold

customer_reviews.title: No tug and pull; works great.
customer_reviews.text: First, I was gonna go with a brand that I've used before, or one a brand that is better known. I saw the amount of good reviews on this one so I went ahead and got it. To my delight, the trimmer does wonders. It doesn't tug and pull and doesn't feel like anything. It gets hair trimmed without pain. The only this is that on my first time, the smell of metal was very strong, but other than that, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Isles Fan 26

customer_reviews.title: Great and pain free
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned one of these for quite some time. I use every week. This thing takes a couple uses to get used to, but it does a great job and is reliable. I changed the batteries once. I have taken apart and cleaned a couple times as well, but I usually just use finger nails to clean out. That usually works fine. I am planning to buy a few to give as gifts. I like the product that much to give away to friends/family. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: MCRinOC

customer_reviews.title: I like it but this is my second one.
customer_reviews.text: 4th trimmer overall. 2nd of this specific one. I may have the worst luck with these but they always seem to break on me. Even with constant maintenance and care. The first one of these, the button jammed and eventually the razor didn't work. After switching to other products that broke within 3 months, I went back to this again as I remember it has the best result. So far it's hanging on in there and it's been about 1 Month.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year and some change.
customer_reviews.text: Started off good. Almost at the 1 year mark i started to wonder why it wasn't working as effective. It totally stopped working some months ago. I never threw it out, but i ran into it today. I put a brand new battery and still NO Luck! Disappointing to say the least. Going out in the garbage tonight.
customer_reviews.author: ND7pineapple

customer_reviews.title: Trimmer blade came apart at first use
customer_reviews.text: I used this trimmer the day I received it. I was pleased with the ease of use. I was pleased that it didn't pull hairs like others I've used. When I opened it to clean it, the trimmer blade came apart. There seems to be no way to repair it. Thus, after one use, the tool is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Harry H. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Meh! It's okay.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace the one that got broken. Based on the reviews I thought this would be the one. Tends to pull some hairs, probably due that fact it has low RPMs. The light doesn't illuminate very well, and the safety switch is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: MacLeod

customer_reviews.title: Pulls hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought based on reviews that it doesn't pull hair. Yea well after using it and washing it a few times, it pulls hairs........
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy—broke quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The product broke after a few months and maybe 10-20 uses. All of a sudden it wouldn’t turn on. I replaced the battery, still nothing.
customer_reviews.author: revprof

product_meta.title: ToiletTree Products Water Resistant Stainless Steel Nose and Ear Hair Trimmer with LED Light
feature_bullets: **LIFETIME GUARENTEE!!!!** This high-end cordless battery-operated nose trimmer with bright LED light is made of high quality steel; the light comes in handy when you need to get at those hard-to-reach and hard-to-see hairs

The lightweight, but powerful, rotary cutting system allows hairs to enter the trimmer tip from the top and also from the sides, which is very helpful for stray hairs not only in the nose but also on your eyebrows, beard, and ears

Right out of the box, you will feel the difference, precision, and quality of this trimmer; it offers a smooth trim with its stainless steel high quality blades and gives you a perfect cut every time; no painful pulled hairs

Our best water-resistant design allows you to use this trimming tool in the shower and it makes clean-up afterwards quick and easy; it's the best trimming and cutting tool you'll ever experience from a men's clipper product
This nose trimmer operates on just 1 AA battery (not included), which makes it an economically affordable way to take care of the daily trimming needs of your nose, brows, and ears

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
